channel.title: ChinaComx: Comics Culture in the People's Republic of China

item.title: Lena Henningsen to Present ChinaComx at the CATS-Forum 2024
item.description: To give a first overview of the ChinaComx project outline, its goals, and research ideas, our PI, Lena Henningsen, will give a presentation at the CATS-Forum held tomorrow, on Friday 26 January 2024, between 11 am (c.t.) – ca. 2 pm, in room 400.02.12 in the Karl Jaspers Centre.

item.title: Call for Applications: 3 PhD Positions
item.description: We are hiring - come work with us and do your PhD on Chinese comics!

item.title: ERC-ChinaComx Begins Its Journey Into the World of Chinese Comics
item.description: Welcome to this new research project titled “ChinaComx: Comics Culture in the People’s Republic of China”!
